root.name: Arthur's Knights: Tales of Chivalry
root.description: OverviewThis is the first game in the Arthur's Knights series. It is an adventure game where the player takes control of the Knight Bradwen. The game features two stories where the player is able to choose to play as a Christian or Celtic Knight. Legendary places including Camelot and Avalon are explored during the game.PC System RequirementsWindows 95/98/MEPentium II 300MHz Processor64MB RAM12X CD-ROM Drive8MB DirectX 7.0-compatible Video Card
